original_text: That is why I did not visit you. I wrote that letter to you instead. You are the people who should make me happy. I did not want you to make me sad when I visited you. I felt sure about all of you. I knew that, if I was happy, then all of you would be happy too.
korean_text: 내가 이같이 쓴 것은 내가 갈 때에 마땅히 나를 기쁘게 할 자로부터 도리어 근심을 얻을까 염려함이요 또 너희 모두에 대한 나의 기쁨이 너희 모두의 기쁨인 줄 확신함이로라

sentences.original_text: That is why I did not visit you.
I wrote that letter to you instead.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 내가 당신들에게 그 편지를 썼습니다.

sentences.original_text: You are the people who should make me happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들은 나를 기쁘게 해야 할 사람들입니다.

sentences.original_text: I did not want you to make me sad when I visited you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 방문했을 때 당신들이 나를 슬프게 하는 것을 원하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: I felt sure about all of you.
I knew that, if I was happy, then all of you would be happy too.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내가 행복하다면 당신들 모두도 행복할 것이라는 것을 알았습니다.
